content: In the Goal resource, a few fields are 'date'. Using type FHIRdatetime allows signing the value but the type gets serialized to startDateTime for example instead of startDate. The former doesn't deserialize, the latter does, even when the value is yyyy-mm-dd of course. What SDK type is used to assign FHIR dates?

There is also an extension method on the native dotnet DateTime type called ToFhirDate() that you can use to assist in formatting that data right. But Michele is right it's the Hl7.Fhir.Model.Date type.
